snippet: Stephon Marbury was putting up huge numbers for the champion Beijing Ducks as the Knicks confronted the loss of the playmaker Jeremy Lin.
abstract: New York Knicks once again find themselves thin at point guard with Jeremy Lin out for the remainder of the regular season; meanwhile, former Knicks point guard Stephon Marbury is enjoying success in China, leading the Beijing Ducks to their first league title.
lead_paragraph: Stephon Marbury was putting up huge numbers for the champion Beijing Ducks as the Knicks confronted the loss of the playmaker Jeremy Lin.

headline.seo: Stephon Marbury Leads Beijing Ducks to Chinese Title
